text: Sabacya janasamuhakarita, tyancya vastimmadhyeca (allahacya samarthyaci) nisani hoti. Tyancya ujavya davya bajula dona baga hotya. (Amhi tyanna adesa dila hota ki) apalya palanakartyane pradana keleli ajivika kha ani tyace abhara manata raha. Hi svaccha - sud'dha bhumi ahe ani palanakarta ksamasila ahe
